fir_text: The accused assaulted the complainant using hands and caused simple injuries.
The accused assaulted the complainant and threatened him with death.
Unknown persons committed theft by breaking into the complainant's house and stealing gold ornaments.
The accused cheated the complainant by taking money on false promises of business returns.
The accused abused the complainant and issued criminal threats.
The accused caused death of a person by driving the vehicle in a rash and negligent manner.
The accused wrongfully restrained the complainant and assaulted him.
The accused threatened the complainant to give false evidence in court.
The accused outraged the modesty of a woman by using criminal force.
The accused committed criminal breach of trust by misappropriating entrusted money.
The accused entered the complainant's house unlawfully with intent to commit an offence.
The accused extorted money from the complainant by threatening harm.
The accused forged documents to cheat the complainant.
The accused voluntarily caused grievous hurt using a dangerous weapon.
The accused insulted and provoked the complainant causing breach of peace.
The accused kidnapped the victim with intent to cause harm.
The accused attempted to commit murder by attacking with a knife.
The accused committed mischief causing damage to public property.
The accused intimidated the complainant through repeated threats.
The accused stole a motor vehicle parked outside the house.
